section.title: GetEmsList
section.para: GetEmsList returns all management systems as list objects.

listitem.para: Output: EmsList as an array. List object contains name and guid properties.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate GetEmsList usage:

example.title: GetEmsList WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="GetEmsList"> </message> <message name="GetEmsListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..EmsListArray"/> </message> ... <xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..EmsList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string" /> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string" /> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>
